first_launch.title: Welcome to AllMyWallets!
first_launch.introduction: AMW is the first decentralized privacy-focused app to see all your wallets at a glance, and receive push notifications whenever your balances change.

aggregates.title: All your wallet balances in the same place
aggregates.description: AMW can retrieve your balances from cryptocurrency explorers to exchanges.

safe.title: Your cryptocurrencies never at risk
safe.description: AMW only uses public keys and read-only API keys to display your balances.

notifications.title: Be notified when your money is on the move
notifications.description: AMW sends push notifications so you can receive notifications on your smartphone without using the app.

decentralized.title: Decentralized and privacy-first
decentralized.description: AMW data is stored in your browser and stays in your browser.

first_launch.requirements: AMW can be used on any modern devices, including your smartphone using Chrome, Chromium or Brave.
